page.title: 03Family Life.
page.content: In our family there our four people. We also have two dogs,a cat and six goldfish.The dogs always break things up in the house.In the morning my dad is the first person to get up,then the rest of us get up.We have four meals a day.Our household appliances are a cooker,fridge,tumble drier,hoover and a spinner.My dad's hobby is gardening. Mine is watching television.We have one car which my Dad uses for work.We don't go on holiday but we go on outings quite often.We wear lots of fashionable clothes in our family. There are a lot of jobs to do around the house.I get on with my parents but not my sister.We only celebrate on special occasions like Christmas,Easter and birthdays.
